lines.gurmukhi: jYsy mDu mwKI sIic sIic kY iekqR krY hrY mDU Awieqw ky muiK Cwru fwir kY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Madhu Maakhee Seechi Seechi Kai Ikatr Karai , Harai Madhoo Aaitaa Kay Moukhi Chhaaru Daari Kai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as honey bee hops from flower to flower and collects honey, but a honey collector smokes the bees away, and takes the honey.

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy bC hyq gaU sMcq hY KIr qwih lyq hY AhIru duih bCry ibfwir kY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Bachh Hayt Gaoo Sanchat Hai Kheera , Taahi Layt Hai Aheeru Duhi Bachharay Bidaari Kai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a cow collects milk in her teats for the calf, but a milkman uses the calf to bring down her milk. He ties the calf away, milks the cow and takes it away.

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy Dr Koid Koid kir ibl swjY mUsw pYsq srpu Dwie Kwie qwih mwir kY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Dhar Khodi Khodi Kari Bil Saajai Moosaa , Paisat Sarapu Dhaai Khaai Taahi Maari Kai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a rodent digs up earth to make a burrow but a snake enters the burrow and eats away the rodent.

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy koit pwp kir mwieAw joir joir mUV AMiq kwil Cwif clY dono kr Jwir kY ]555]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Koti Paap Kari Maaiaa Jori Jori Moorha , Anti Kaali Chhaadi Chalai Dono Kar Jhaari Kai ?555?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly an ignorant and foolish person indulges in umpteen sins, collects wealth and leaves this world empty-handed. (All his earnings and material goods prove worthless ultimately).  (555)
